fullText: This musical about everybody's favorite green ogre is so desperate to be liked that it makes you want to run in the other direction. 'Shrek the Musical' opened on Sunday night at the Broadway Theater with the manic, flopsweat-inducing eagerness of a clown at a 5-year-old's birthday party.
